Translations.Text: Rajyadhipati, pabitra, parakramasali o prajnamaya allahara pabitrata ghosana kare, ya kichu ache nabhomandale o ya kichu ache bhumandale.

Tini'i niraksaradera madhya theke ekajana rasula prerana karechena, yini tadera kache patha karena tara ayatasamuha, taderake pabitra karena ebam siksa dena kitaba o hikamata. Itipurbe tara chila ghora pathabhrastataya lipta.
E'i rasula prerita hayechena an'ya ara'o lokadera jan'ye, yara ekhana'o tadera sathe milita hayani. Tini parakramasali, prajnamaya.
Eta allahara krpa, yake iccha tini ta dana karena. Allaha mahakrpasila.

Yaderake ta'orata deya hayechila, atahpara tara tara anusarana kareni, tadera drstanta se'i gadha, ye pustaka bahana kare, yara allahara ayatasamuhake mithya bale, tadera drstanta kata nikrsta. Allaha jalema sampradayake patha pradarsana karena na.
Baluna he ihudigana, yadi tomara dabi kara ye, tomara'i allahara bandhu-an'ya kona manaba naya, tabe tomara mrtyu kamana kara yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.
Tara nijedera krtakarmera karane kakhana'o mrtyu kamana karabe na. Allaha jalemadera samparke samyaka abagata achena.

Baluna, tomara ye mrtyu theke palayanapara, se'i mrtyu abasya'i tomadera mukhamukhi habe, atahpara tomara adrsya, drsyera jnani allahara kache upasthita habe. Tini tomaderake janiye dibena sesaba karma, ya tomara karate.
